mapper.sql: repayment_id, order_id, order_batch_id, period, current_repay_date, current_payable_principal, current_payable_interest, student_repay_status, super_repay_status, interest, lc_money, current_money, ensure_money, payed_time, repayment_money, paid_money, state, marketing_fee_yi, service_charge_yi, ensure_money_state, guaranyee_cash_id, people_type, stu_state

select
distinct
from repayment_plan_info
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into repayment_plan_info (repayment_id, order_id, order_batch_id, period, current_repay_date, current_payable_principal, current_payable_interest, student_repay_status, super_repay_status, interest, lc_money, current_money, ensure_money, payed_time, repayment_money, paid_money, state, marketing_fee_yi, service_charge_yi, ensure_money_state, guaranyee_cash_id, people_type, stu_state ) values (#{repaymentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderBatchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{period,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{currentRepayDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{currentPayablePrincipal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{currentPayableInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{studentRepayStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{superRepayStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{interest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lcMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{currentMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ensureMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payedTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{repaymentMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{paidMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{marketingFeeYi,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{serviceChargeYi,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ensureMoneyState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{guaranyeeCashId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{peopleType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{stuState,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
